name: The Juju Bog
description:
Early mockup of the interior of the Bad Juju Mutant Vehicle. The exterior can be found in other published models, this design focuses soley on the interior space.

Bad Juju is the corpse of an enormous alligator, reanimated to serve as the eyes and ears of an ancient Kami of the swamp.

The waterlogged roots of an ancient cypress twist through her limbs and spine, the nerves of the swamp that she carries with her.

The swamp lounge is designed to be a dark and unsettling place to hitch a ride in, peaceful if you can embrace the vibrant and dark side of nature.
